variations.description: Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to 60% of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.
Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to 70% of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.
Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to 80% of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.
Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to 90% of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.
Summons an aurora that attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Magic DMG equal to 150% of ATK. Immune to control effects while skill is active.
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to 90% of ATK to all enemies.
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to 105% of ATK to all enemies.
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK to all enemies.
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to 135% of ATK to all enemies.
Unleashes the Aurora's power, placing Aurora's Blessing on all allies for 5 seconds. Aurora's Blessing: Doll skills deal extra Magic DMG equal to 150% of ATK to all enemies.
